colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES SMAN GYI BLA BEEd'URYA 'OD KYI RGYAL PO MCHED BDUN THUB PA'I DBAN GPO DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB PA'I MCHOD PA MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI NI 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I ZHE HOR GYI PHO BRANG GI GTZUGS KHANG DU 'KHOG PA'I THER GUN T'A BLA MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSAM 'GRUB KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, HA CAN BSDUS PA'I LUGS 'DI SLA CHOS SU 'GRO BAR SNANG YANG, BSKUL BA PO'I BLO NGO DANG BSTUN, ,@005B RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DANG KUN GZIGS LNGA PA CHEN PO'I MDZAD PA'I CHO GA RNAMS LAS SNYING POR BSDU TE, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE MKHOR BA GSOL DPON MKHAS MCHOG GO ,BKRA SHIS PAR BGYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
